snippet: The Cuban performance artist Tania Bruguera was released from custody on Friday after her third arrest this week related to her efforts to push for freedom of expression.
abstract: Cuban performance artist Tania Bruguera is released from custody after her third arrest related to her efforts to push for freedom of expression.
lead_paragraph: The Cuban performance artist Tania Bruguera was released from custody on Friday after her third arrest this week related to her efforts to push for freedom of expression.
